commits.author: Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Create new NRTManager. * * @param writer IndexWriter to open near-real-time * readers * @param warmer optional {@link SearcherWarmer}. Pass * null if you don't require the searcher to warmed * before going live. If this is non-null then a * merged segment warmer is installed on the * provided IndexWriter's config. * *

NOTE: the provided {@link SearcherWarmer} is * not invoked for the initial searcher; you should * warm it yourself if necessary. */ public NRTManager(IndexWriter writer, SearcherWarmer warmer) throws IOException { this(writer, null, warmer, true); }
